options: Imbere ni itara ry'umuhondo ritwariwe ibumoso
Inyuma ni itara ryera ritwariwe ibumoso n'umuntu uri ku murongo w'inyuma hafi  y'umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Iyo bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe bimeze nk'igihe cy'ibihu  cyangwa cy'imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, udutsiko twose  tw'abanyamaguru nk'imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw'abanyeshuri bari ku murongo  bayobowe n'umwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu  barenze umwe bagomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira :

options: Mu tuyira turi kumpande z'umuhanda no ku nkengero zigiye hejuru
question: Abanyamaguru batatanye cyangwa bagize udutsiko tudafatanyije gahunda kandi  batayobowe n'umwarimu bategetswe kunyura he?

options: Uguhinguka ku mwaro cyangwa ku nkombe cyangwa ahegereye icyome
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
Amatara ndanga burumbarare, agomba kubonwa nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye n'umuyobozi  w'ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ya

Kubyerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana  ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo, birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarura  rumuri, uretse ibitegetswe, ariko ibyo ntibireba amatara akurikira
Ibyapa byerekana icyago kidahoraho kandi bigenewe kwerekana aho bagana cyangwa  aho berekeza umuhanda nk'igihe cy'impanuka cyangwa hari imirimo ikorwa mu  muhanda birangwa n'amabara akurikira:

options: Sibyiza ko yazinyuraho atabasha kureba neza imbere ye
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga akurikiye ibinyabiziga bibiri, yifuza kubinyuraho. N'iki  yashingiraho mbere yo kubanyuraho?
Ahatari mu nsisiro ibyapa biburira n'ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere bigomba  gushyirwa mu ntera ikurikira y'ahantu habyerekana:

options: ibyo byapa bishyirwaho hakurikijwe intera ibitandukanya
mu gice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kiri hagati yaho bishinze n'inkomane ikurikiyeho  ku ruhande rw'inzira bishinzeho
question: Ibyapa bibuza n'ibitegeka bikurikizwa gusa aha hakurikira:
Ibice by'umuhanda byera bigari biteganye n'umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo  ,kabiri bisobanura:
Muri ibi binyabiziga n'ikihe gihagaze nabi?
Umurongo uciyemo uduce umenyesha ahegereye umurongo ushobora kuzuzwa  n'uturanga gukata tw'ibara ryera utwo turanga cyerekezo tumenyesha :

options: Kuvuza ihoni akaguma ku muvuduko yahozeho
Gukomeza agendera ku muvuduko uri hejuru mu gihe umunyamaguru  ategereje
Kuguma ku muvuduko yari afite mu gihe umunyamaguru atarambuka
Kugabanya umuvuduko mu gihe cyiza ukitegura guhagarara
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ageze hafi y'inzira y'abanyamaguru yakwitwara ate?

options: ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2 na cm 10
question: ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira itara ry'ubururu rimyatsa riboneka mu mpande  zose:

Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe  n'ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo  bikurikira ku bugari bw'icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri n'ikinyabiziga gikururwa n'inyamaswa  ntibishobora gukurura :

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ku kinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntikigomba  kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
Iyo bidashoboka gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa metero imwe kandi  umunyamaguru akaba anyura hafi y'inkomyi umuyobozi agomba kuyikikira afite  umuvuduko utarengeje
Iyo umuhanda ugabanijemo ibisate bibiri kandi ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi umuyobozi abujijwe :

options: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara ry'umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
itara risa n'icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma
question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe bimeze bitagishoboka  kubona neza muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri  cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite  umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw'ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma  itara ry'ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo  bukurikira:
